channel.title: CVE Feed for Debian -- redis
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Debian -- redis

item.title: CVE-2022-0543|2024-09-16T22:51:02.509Z -- debian -- redis
item.description: It was discovered, that redis, a persistent key-value database, due to a packaging issue, is prone to a (Debian-specific) Lua sandbox escape, which could result in remote code execution.
